title: How to Make Original Finger Gelatin (Knox Blox)

steps.headline: Boil water in a pot on a stove.
Mix in your gelatin packets.
steps.description: Packets may be of any taste you want, as long as they are all the same.

steps.headline: Stir completely until the mixture is fully dissolved.
Pour into a pan.
steps.description: Use a pan that is roughly 13x9".

steps.headline: Let the substance cool gradually for 30 minutes.
Refrigerate for an additional hour, or until it becomes firm.
Finish up the recipe.
steps.description: Cut the refrigerated gelatin into bite-size or finger foods you can serve to anyone in your household.

text: Boil water in a pot on a stove.  Mix in your gelatin packets. Packets may be of any taste you want, as long as they are all the same. Add in the Knox Gelatine.  Stir completely until the mixture is fully dissolved.  Pour into a pan. Use a pan that is roughly 13x9". Let the substance cool gradually for 30 minutes.  Refrigerate for an additional hour, or until it becomes firm.  Finish up the recipe. Cut the refrigerated gelatin into bite-size or finger foods you can serve to anyone in your household.
